title: Darwin was right!
brief_description: Fun and games with the animals at the Goologul Gardens including seals, bears and monkeys. Focusses mainly on chimpanzees with footage of them at various “human” activities - playing drums, fiddling with a hand-cranked camera, bathing a baby etc.
